Module org.example.eiscuno
Package org.example.eiscuno.model.Animations

Class GameStageAnimations

java.lang.Object
org.example.eiscuno.model.Animations.GameStageAnimations
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnimationAdapter
public class GameStageAnimations extends Object implements AnimationAdapter
Implements the AnimationAdapter interface to provide common animations such as fade-in, fade-out, and scaling effects for JavaFX nodes.
